an5.37:1.1: “Mendicants, when a giver gives food, they give the recipients five things.
an5.37:1.3: Long life, beauty, happiness, strength, and eloquence.
an5.37:1.4: Giving long life, they have long life as a god or human.
an5.37:1.5: Giving beauty, they have beauty as a god or human.
an5.37:1.6: Giving happiness, they have happiness as a god or human.
an5.37:1.7: Giving strength, they have strength as a god or human.
an5.37:1.8: Giving eloquence, they are eloquent as a god or human.
an5.37:1.9: When a giver gives food, they give the recipients five things.
